title: Mastering the Basics of Microsoft Excel
headline: Learn how to use Microsoft Excel and pick up advanced spreadsheet skills in this free online data visualisation course.
description: The world of technology sees constant change as new software hits the market and established programs are updated. Microsoft Excel is a powerful and popular spreadsheet program used by individuals and businesses of all sizes. This Excel tutorial explains how to use its basic and advanced features to make you a data visualisation expert. Spreadsheets are a staple of most white-collar jobs so sign up to enrich your skills and advance your career.
courseDescription:
Many people and organisations always use spreadsheet applications to handle various data visualisation tasks. Google Sheets and Microsoft Excel are among today’s most popular and useful programs. This course explains how to use Microsoft Excel to boost productivity. We begin with the basics such as installing and starting up Excel, saving a workbook and changing preferences and formatting elements to suit your needs. 

We then examine the use of formulas and comparison operators in Excel. Some people find it difficult to work with Excel so this course uses simple terms to explain how to perform each function step by step. We demonstrate how to print a workbook and manage your passwords in Excel. We then go through the use of important advanced spreadsheet features like ‘IF’ functions.

This Excel tutorial provides a strong understanding of the program and the skills that make you a spreadsheet expert. These data visualisation skills can also be applied with Google Sheets and boost your professional value in most career fields. Most white collar jobs require some familiarity with spreadsheets so sign up for this MS Excel tutorial to become the office expert with invaluable skills.
